verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All consuming fire You’re my heart’s desire And I love You dearly, dearly Lord. You’re my meditation And my consolation{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And I love You dearly, dearly Lord. Glory to the Lamb I exalt the Great I Am Reigning on Your glorious throne You are my eternal home.{/lang-eng}
